job_description:
üöÄ Hiring: Java Developer | AWS | Python
üìç Location: Wilmington, DE (Onsite/Hybrid as per client)
üìÑ Type: Contract

We are actively hiring a strong Java Developer for a contract role in Wilmington, DE. The ideal candidate will have solid experience in Java backend development, along with hands-on exposure to AWS and Python, working on enterprise-scale applications.

üîë Required Skills:

‚úÖ Core Java / Java 8+
‚úÖ Spring Boot & Microservices
‚úÖ AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, etc.)
‚úÖ Python (scripting or backend development)
‚úÖ RESTful APIs & distributed systems
‚úÖ Strong analytical and communication skills

üéØ Why Join?
Long-term contract opportunity
Modern cloud-based tech stack
Work on large-scale enterprise systems
Competitive contract rates

üì© Interested candidates or referrals:
Please share your resume at üìß sikandercharak@hanstaffing.com
ai_prompt:
You are a professional job application assistant. Based on the job description and resume provided, generate a concise email.

Please provide:
1. A concise, professional subject line
2. A personalized email body that:
   - Expresses genuine interest in the position
   - Highlights relevant skills and experience from the resume that match the job description
   - Demonstrates knowledge of the role
   - Includes a clear call to action
   - Maintains a professional yet personable tone
3. Body should
Format your response as JSON with two fields: "subject" and "body".

Subject should be
Application for [role name] (Location).

Signature at end of email should be.
Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434

Please format the email body with proper line breaks:
- One line break after the greeting
- Double line breaks between paragraphs
- One line break before the signature
- Use \n for line breaks
- Make sure to format the body same like below example response but alter according to jd

Example format:
Hello ,\n\n[Paragraph 1]\n\n[Paragraph 2]\n\nBest regards,\n[Your Name]

Example response:

Hello,

I hope you‚Äôre doing well.

Thank you for sharing the details of the Senior Java Microservices Engineer (Cloud-Native | Reactive Systems) position in Sunnyvale, CA. I‚Äôm very interested in this opportunity and believe my experience aligns closely with the role requirements.

I have over 10 years of experience in designing and developing scalable, cloud-native, and microservices-based enterprise applications using Java (8‚Äì17), Spring Boot, and distributed systems architecture. My technical background also includes hands-on expertise with Kubernetes, Docker, GCP, Azure, and messaging frameworks such as Kafka.

Some highlights from my experience include:

- Designing reactive, fault-tolerant microservices using Spring Boot, WebFlux, and Camel.

- Deploying and scaling microservices on Kubernetes and cloud platforms (Azure & GCP).

- Working with Oracle, Cassandra, and Cosmos DB for distributed data processing.

- Implementing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Git, ensuring high code quality through JUnit, Mockito, and TDD practices.

- Strong focus on performance tuning, multithreading, and high availability in distributed systems.


Please find my updated resume attached for your review. I would love the opportunity to discuss how my experience aligns with your client‚Äôs needs.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

{Signature}
email_subject: Application for Java Developer | AWS | Python (Wilmington, DE)
email_body:
Hello,

I hope this email finds you well.

I am excited to apply for the Java Developer | AWS | Python position in Wilmington, DE. After reviewing the job description, I am enthusiastic about the opportunity as my experience in Java backend development, AWS, and Python align closely with the required skills.

With over 7 years of experience in Java development, including Spring Boot, microservices, and AWS services like EC2, S3, and Lambda, I have successfully delivered scalable enterprise applications. Additionally, I have hands-on experience with Python for scripting and backend development, along with building RESTful APIs in distributed systems.

I am particularly drawn to this role because of the modern cloud-based tech stack and the opportunity to work on large-scale enterprise systems. I am confident that my skills and experience make me a strong candidate for this position.

I have attached my updated resume for your review. I would appreciate the chance to discuss further how I can contribute to your team.

Looking forward to the opportunity to connect.

Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434

job_description:
üöÄ We're Hiring! üöÄ
Job Title: Java Developer with Groovy

Key Responsibilities
Develop, enhance, and maintain applications using Groovy, Java, and related technologies.
Write clean, reusable, and efficient Groovy scripts for automation and application logic.
Work with frameworks such as Grails or Gradle (if applicable).
Integrate applications with REST/SOAP APIs and backend systems.
Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize application performance.
Collaborate in code reviews and design discussions.
Develop and maintain technical documentation.

Required Skills
Strong hands-on experience with Groovy scripting.
Experience with Java and JVM-based technologies.
Familiarity with Grails, Gradle, Spring, or related frameworks.
Solid understanding of object-oriented programming (OOP) and design principles.
Experience integrating with REST/SOAP web services.
Strong debugging, analytical, and performance optimization skills.
Ability to collaborate in a team environment and participate in code reviews.

Send your resume to sadhika@tekcog.com

job_description:
Job Title : Sr. Java Developer (Frontend-Focused)Ex-capital One ONLY

Location: Remote

Duration: 12+ Months 

*Ex-capital One ONLY*

Job Overview:

We are hiring Senior Java Developers to support the Empath Agent Services Platform, specifically focused on agent-facing UI applications used in Card Fraud Technology.

This role is frontend-heavy (75% UI / 25% backend) and involves building intelligent, guided workflows that help customer service agents resolve fraud-related issues efficiently.

Job Description:

Design, develop, and enhance frontend UI components using Java and Vue.js (Micro Frontends)

Build and maintain guided, intelligent workflows that prompt agents with the right questions and screens

Support and enhance a rules-driven UI system that determines agent workflows and decision paths

Please share your resume to msameer@sparkinfotech.com

job_description:
Our client has few open roles for Java Back-end developers. The client needs a Lead Java Developer and Sr. Java Developer. Hybrid roles 2-3 days a week on site in Downtown Chicago. One more Sr. Developer - 5 days a week on site. Same location. Long Term

Java 11 or higher version
Experience developing apps using relational and NoSQL databases
Application architectural patterns such as MVC, Microservices, Event Driven
TDD and BDD development
Deployment using CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, GoCD, Azure DevOps etc.
Deploying and maintaining software using public clouds such as AWS or Azure.
Experience working with MQs/Msg. Brokers such as Kafka, RabbitMQ, AWS SQS, AWS SNS, Apache ActiveMQ, Kinesis - at least one of those.
Batch or stream processing
Experience designing well-defined Restful APIs
Solid understanding and experience with End Points
Experience writing API proxies on platforms such as Apigee Edge, AWS API Gateway or Azure API Gateway (at least one of those)
Hands one experience with API tools such as Swagger and Assertible
Hands-on experience with testing tools such as Selenium and Cucumber

Please send your resume to vb@systegration.com

job_description:
EXPERT TOP-NOTCH LONG-TERM 100% ONSITE JAVA DEVELOPER CONTRACT IN DOWNTOWN CHICAGO FOR OUR DIRECT CLIENT
 
LOCAL GREATER CHICAGO CANDIDATES WILL BE CONSIDERED FIRST!!!
 
DIRECT CLIENT (FORTUNE 100 COMPANY), IMMEDIATE START
 
JAVA 11 OR HIGHER
 
H1B/GC/USC
 
C2C
 
3 MS TEAMS INTERVIEWS WITH CODING!
 
Requirements:
 
 ‚Ä¢ Must have 15+yrs of experience with Java 11 or higher version and should be able to do coding.
 ‚Ä¢ Experience developing apps using relational and NoSQL databases.
 ‚Ä¢ Application architectural patterns such as MVC, Microservices, Event Driven.
 ‚Ä¢ TDD and BDD development.
 ‚Ä¢ Deployment using CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, GoCD, Azure DevOps etc.
 ‚Ä¢ Deploying and maintaining software using public clouds such as AWS or Azure.
 ‚Ä¢ Experience working with MQs/Msg. Brokers such as Kafka, RabbitMQ, AWS SQS, AWS SNS, Apache ActiveMQ, Kinesis - at least one of those.
 ‚Ä¢ Batch or stream processing.
 ‚Ä¢ Experience designing well-defined Restful APIs.
 ‚Ä¢ Experience writing API proxies on platforms such as Apigee Edge, AWS API Gateway or Azure API Gateway (at least one of those).
 ‚Ä¢ Hands one experience with API tools such as Swagger and Assertible.
 ‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience with testing tools such as Selenium and Cucumber.
BECAUSE OF THE HUGE VOLUME OF CALLS, I CANNOT ANSWER THE PHONE. Sending emails with ALL the requested information is the fastest way to have your resume reviewed.
 
Please provide Updated Resume, Years of Experience, Contact Information, Visa Status, Rate (must be the most competitive!), Current Location, and Month and Day of Birth (no Year is necessary!) for all of your candidates!
 
EMAIL is the best way to get a response to your submission!!! 

Ben Golub
 Senior Technical Recruiter
 Systegration, Inc.
 bgolub@systegration.com

job_description:
Title: Full stack Developer
Location: Plano, TX (F2F Required & Onsite from Day 1)
Duration- 12 Months contract
Mode of interview: F2F (Both L1 & Client interview)
 
NOTE: Although its a FSD role but here we are looking 70% frontend and 30% Backend.

Job Description:
Frontend (React + Micro Fronends+ Next.js)
Build modular reusable UI components using React and Redux
Architect and implement micro frontend solutions for scalable frontend development
Use next.js for server-side-rendering (SSR), routing and performance optimization.
Backend(Spring boot Microservices and GraphQL api‚Äôs)
Design, develop and maintain Restful APIs and microservices using spring boot.
Implement service orchestration, inter-service communication and API gateway patterns
Ensure high availability, scalability and security of backend services
Integrate with databases and external systems
Apply best practices in CI/CD, containerization and cloud deployments

Please forward resume at ajay.kumar@deltassi.biz
